snippet: “It’s one thing if your demographic is 50-year-olds, but his demographic is lots of little girls who need to go home and go to bed,” one frustrated mother said.
abstract: “It’s one thing if your demographic is 50-year-olds, but his demographic is lots of little girls who need to go home and go to bed,” one frustrated mother said.

headline.main: Oooohs Turn to Boos as Bieber Shows Up Late for Concert
headline.print_headline: Oohs Turn to Boos When Bieber Is Late
